Sebion:
Stranger! Good thing you came. I wanted to ask you about something. You were in the Labyrinth Bellis? Our scouts have discovered ruins. Deep underground tunnel connects them with the Labyrinth Bellis. In the tunnel at the scouts into trouble, and they ran away from there. And now refuse to return. I would like to ask you to deal with it if you do not mind ...
"What kind of problems have arisen from the scouts?"
